daa.practice1.randomaccessmachine

Class RandomAccessMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • daa.practice1.randomaccessmachine.RandomAccessMachine

  • public class RandomAccessMachine
extends java.lang.Object
    The Random Access Machine is an abstract computational-machine identical to the counter machine but adding the indirect addressing. The machine has a Program Memory, Data Memory, Input Tape and OutputTape objects to execute a program. Besides it uses the ArithmeticLogicUnit to do all the calculation.
    Since:
    15-2-2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    √Ångel Igareta

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(boolean debug)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Method to start the Random Access Machine. While there is not an error or halt instruction it keeps executing the instructions in the Program Memory and showing the result if the debug option is enabled.
        Parameters:
        debug - Option to show all the process.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • moveIP

        private void moveIP(java.lang.Integer nextIp)
        Method that moves the ipIndex to the one passed by argument.
        Parameters:
        nextIp - Next position of Ip Index.

      • executeInstruction

        private void executeInstruction()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to execute the Instruction that is located where the ipIndex is pointing. For finding which method to call it analyze the instruction and call the method with the same name as the instructionType.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is a runtime exception.

      • resolveIndirectAddressing

        private int resolveIndirectAddressing(int iValue)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to resolve the Indirect addressing of the iRegister passed by argument. Remember that jValue = [R iValue]
        Parameters:
        iValue -
        Returns:
        jValue
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is an error reading the Register with index iValue.

      • load

        private void load(Operating operating)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        The instruction load stores an operating in the ACC or Register with index 0.
        Parameters:
        operating - Operating that matches that instruction.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is a runtime error for the instruction with that operating.

      • store

        private void store(Operating operating)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        The instruction store stores the value of the ACC or Register with index 0 in the result value of the addressing type. Obviously it doesn't work with constant addressing. You can't assign a value to a constant.
        Parameters:
        operating - Operating that matches that instruction.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is a runtime error for the instruction with that operating.

          throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        operating - Operating that matches that instruction.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is a runtime error for the instruction with that operating.

      • div

        private void div(Operating operating)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        This instruction divides the value of the ACC or Register with index 0 with the result value of the addressing type. The ALU is concerned about the Arithmetical error of division by 0.
        Parameters:
        operating - Operating that matches that instruction.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is a runtime error for the instruction with that operating.

      • read

        private void read(Operating operating)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        This instruction reads a value of the input Tape and stores it in the result value of the addressing type. It doesn't work with the constant addressing and neither if the result register is the ACC.
        Parameters:
        operating - Operating that matches that instruction.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is a runtime error for the instruction with that operating.

      • write

        private void write(Operating operating)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        This instruction reads the result value of the addressing type and stores it in the Output Tape. It doesn't work with the constant addressing and neither if the result register is the ACC.
        Parameters:
        operating - Operating that matches that instruction.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is a runtime error for the instruction with that operating.

      • jump

        private void jump(Operating operating)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        This instruction moves the IpIndex to the line of the tag passed by argument.
        Parameters:
        operating - Operating that matches that instruction.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is a runtime error for the instruction with that operating.

        operating - Operating that matches that instruction.

        java.lang.Exception - If there is a runtime error for the instruction with that operating.
